verbs.description: [ARG1: The global system] [V: was] [ARG2: long overdue for a shake - up] . Trump has been happy to oblige .
The global system was long overdue for a shake - up . Trump [V: has] been happy to oblige .
The global system was long overdue for a shake - up . [ARG1: Trump] has [V: been] [ARG2: happy to oblige] .
The global system was long overdue for a shake - up . [ARG0: Trump] has been happy to [V: oblige] .
